headline: MarketAxess to Host Conference Call Announcing Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Financial Results on Thursday, February 6, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, January 17, 2025--MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: MKTX) the operator of a leading electronic trading platform for fixed-income securities, will issue a press release announcing its fourth quarter and full-year 2024 financial results on Thursday, February 6, 2025, before the market opens. Chris Concannon, Chief Executive Officer, Richard Schiffman, Global Head of Trading Solutions, and Ilene Fiszel Bieler, Chief Financial Officer, will host a conference call to provide a strategic up
